content: Niels is a graduate student in the Language Science department at the University of California, Irvine. He is co-advised by Dr. Lisa Pearl and Dr. Richard Futrell. His research investigates questions in the field of language acquisition with a focus on syntactic representation and computational models of representation.

title: Niels Dickson
Learning constraints on wh-dependencies by learning how to efficiently represent wh-dependencies: A developmental modeling investigation with Fragment Grammars

The Relative Contributions of Taxonomic and Thematic Knowledge When Making Similarity Judgements
